ygData.subject: Re: Doh
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is one thing that I think the lute is good for. Harmonic punches a snake for 13 points of damage. Harmonic punches a willowisp for 12 points of
ygData.messageBody:
> I have heard rumors that this Lute doesn't do anything good, can anyone
> confirm this for me? Might make me feel a little better.

There is one thing that I think the lute is good for.

Harmonic punches a snake for 13 points of damage.
Harmonic punches a willowisp for 12 points of damage.
Harmonic punches King Thex'Ka IV for 9 points of damage.

There you have it. That's the most use you'll receive from that pos.

Ask them to take you to Mistmoore and get a more commonly dropped
'Gypsy Lute'(sm). It's no-drop and gives +5 to magic, no healing
bonuses tho. But at least it's something.

Harmonic.
